title: Traditional Twitch idea
body:
I figured I should share my thoughts on a skin for Twitch. I understand the difference between say Twitch and Karma's visual and audio. Twitch received an overall makeover with what he looks and sounds like. Karma received a voiceover change, but not a massive look change.
So my thought was, considering the change from Twitch's new to old model is huge, maybe people would enjoy a skin (maybe a cheap one, maybe not) that renewed and refreshed his original audio. Maybe tweak the visuals on it a bit as well, but maybe not.

I just thought i'd throw this idea out in the open, and see what the community thinks.
Thanks for listening to my idea guys!

Andrew

replies.body: Riot said no more traditional skins, but Id love to see this.
